info.title: Source Code API v2
info.description: This documentation describes the Source Code API.

delete.description:
Resets the cache that stores all access rights for users.
If query is not passed, then we reset the entire cache; if passed, then only certain parameters
Datasource: DB

parameters.name: self
parameters.description: if self is true, then the cache value is reset for the user who makes the request

parameters.name: rev
parameters.description: git rev (commit/branch/tag,commit-ish or any other git revision). Returns all commits by default.

parameters.name: until
parameters.description: git until rev (commit/branch/tag,commit-ish or any other git revision). See git log A..B.

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: cursor of the requested page (received from the previous request)

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: page size of results (ignored if cursor is set)

parameters.name: before
parameters.description: show commits older than a specific date.

parameters.name: after
parameters.description: show commits more recent than a specific date.

parameters.name: fullHistory
parameters.description: show full history incl. all merge commits

get.description:
Get project repository commits diff.
Datasource: Git

parameters.name: rev
parameters.description: git rev (commit/branch/tag,commit-ish or any other git revision).

parameters.name: until
parameters.description: git until rev (commit/branch/tag,commit-ish or any other git revision). See `git diff A B`. The resulting diff doesn't include `until` commit content, but you could use `<refname>^` syntax to include commit content. If not set diff includes all commits up to and including the initial.

parameters.name: binary
parameters.description: whether to include binary file changes. if true, the diff is applicable with git apply

get.description:
Get project repository commit.

ApplyRepositoryPatchInput.title: ApplyRepositoryPatchInput

last_commit_id.description:
Commit ID this patch is based on.
Might be empty if the repo is not initialized (empty).

target_branch.description: Target branch name (will be created if it doesn't exist).

ApplyRepositoryPatchInput.description: Represents the repository apply patch options.

decision.description:
Decision.
pending AssigneeDecisionPending  No decision yet.
approve AssigneeDecisionApprove  Pull request approved.
reject AssigneeDecisionReject  Pull request rejected.
decision.x-go-enum-desc:
pending AssigneeDecisionPending  No decision yet.
approve AssigneeDecisionApprove  Pull request approved.
reject AssigneeDecisionReject  Pull request rejected.

AssigneeDecisionInput.title: AssigneeDecisionInput

decision.x-go-enum-desc:
pending AssigneeDecisionPending  No decision yet.
approve AssigneeDecisionApprove  Pull request approved.
reject AssigneeDecisionReject  Pull request rejected.

AssigneeDecisionInput.description: Represents a repository pull request assignee decision input model.

AutoMergeInput.title: AutoMergeInput

delete_source_branch.description: Delete source branch option for merged pull request

merge_style.description:
Pull request's merge style
merge PullRequestMergeStyleMerge  Non fast-forward merge source into target.
rebase PullRequestMergeStyleRebase  Rebase a source onto a target and do fast-forward merge.
fast-forward-only PullRequestMergeStyleFastForward  Fast-forward only merge.
squash PullRequestMergeStyleSquash  Squash commits into single commit and do non fast-forward merge.
rebase-merge PullRequestMergeStyleRebaseMerge  Rebase a source into target and do non fast-forward merge.
manually-merged PullRequestMergeStyleManuallyMerged  Pull request has been merged manually, just mark it as merged directly.
merge_style.x-go-enum-desc:
merge PullRequestMergeStyleMerge  Non fast-forward merge source into target.
rebase PullRequestMergeStyleRebase  Rebase a source onto a target and do fast-forward merge.
fast-forward-only PullRequestMergeStyleFastForward  Fast-forward only merge.
squash PullRequestMergeStyleSquash  Squash commits into single commit and do non fast-forward merge.
rebase-merge PullRequestMergeStyleRebaseMerge  Rebase a source into target and do non fast-forward merge.
manually-merged PullRequestMergeStyleManuallyMerged  Pull request has been merged manually, just mark it as merged directly.

AutoMergeInput.description: # Represents pull request's auto merge configuration input

AutoMergeStatus.title: AutoMergeStatus
AutoMergeStatus.description:
Represents pull request auto merge status.
pending
error
completed

AutoMergeUpdateInput.title: AutoMergeUpdateInput

delete_source_branch.description: Delete source branch option for merged pull request

merge_style.description:
Pull request's merge style
merge PullRequestMergeStyleMerge  Non fast-forward merge source into target.
rebase PullRequestMergeStyleRebase  Rebase a source onto a target and do fast-forward merge.
fast-forward-only PullRequestMergeStyleFastForward  Fast-forward only merge.
squash PullRequestMergeStyleSquash  Squash commits into single commit and do non fast-forward merge.
rebase-merge PullRequestMergeStyleRebaseMerge  Rebase a source into target and do non fast-forward merge.
manually-merged PullRequestMergeStyleManuallyMerged  Pull request has been merged manually, just mark it as merged directly.
merge_style.x-go-enum-desc:
merge PullRequestMergeStyleMerge  Non fast-forward merge source into target.
rebase PullRequestMergeStyleRebase  Rebase a source onto a target and do fast-forward merge.
fast-forward-only PullRequestMergeStyleFastForward  Fast-forward only merge.
squash PullRequestMergeStyleSquash  Squash commits into single commit and do non fast-forward merge.
rebase-merge PullRequestMergeStyleRebaseMerge  Rebase a source into target and do non fast-forward merge.
manually-merged PullRequestMergeStyleManuallyMerged  Pull request has been merged manually, just mark it as merged directly.

AutoMergeUpdateInput.description: # Represents pull request's auto merge update input

is_active.description: If set then issues auto-linking are enabled.

issue_prefix.description: This prefix appended by alphanumeric string(A-Z, 0-9,-) will generate a link anytime it is found in an issue, pull request or commit.

target_url_template.description:
Defines target URL template.
The URL must contain <num> for the reference number.

BranchWithMetadataInput.title: BranchWithMetadataInput

branches.description: List of branches to get metadata

BranchWithMetadataInput.description: Represents a input for getting branch metadata.

CIBuild.title: CIBuild is a common response object.

CIBuildStatus.title: CIBuildStatus
CIBuildStatus.description:
Represents pull request auto merge status.
BUILDING
IN_QUEUE
IN_PROGRESS
INPUT_WAIT
SUCCESS
ABORTED
FAILURE
UNSTABLE

CheckConnectionWebhookErrorSource.title: CheckConnectionWebhookErrorSource
CheckConnectionWebhookErrorSource.description:
ontains the source of the response from where the error message came.
Represents webhook source error.
sfera_service_account: The service account could not receive the token.
sfera_ci_authentication: The CI/CD was not authenticated.
sfera_ci_permissions: There are no rights in CI/CD.
sfera_ci_project_not_found: The project was not found in CI/CD.
sfera_ci_generic_error: There is a secondary error in CI/CD.

CheckConnectionWebhookStatus.title: CheckConnectionWebhookStatus
CheckConnectionWebhookStatus.description:
ontains the status of the response from the test connection to sfera.CI/CD.
Represents webhook status error.
succeed: Successful connection to sfera.CI/CD.
error: Error checking the test connection to sfera.CI/CD.

https.description: HTTPS is a link for cloning repo using HTTPS

ssh.description: SSH is a link for cloning repo using SSH

message.description: Message is the error message visible to the user (more details can be gathered via logs and requestID).

metadata.description:
In order to find out what are the variants of specific values in this key, please search for the models with the following names:
\*ErrorMetadata
RepoTagErrorMetadata

scope.description: Scope defines the scope of an error (query parameter, business entity etc).

Error.description: Defines the format of an error response.

ErrorScopeElement.title: ErrorScopeElement
ErrorScopeElement.description: Defines the scope of an error response.

ErrorType.title: ErrorType

Enumerates the different types of errors.
enum:
internal
auth
bad_input
not_found
already_exists
not_allowed
conflict

Event.title: Event
Event.description: defines the container for all PPSC events.

EventType.title: EventType
EventType.description:
defines an event type (the corresponding JSON field is filled based on enum).
pr_status_change: triggers on pull request status change
pr_source_branch_update: triggers on pull request's source branch update
repository_push: triggers on push
repository_branch_created: triggers on branch created
repository_branch_deleted: triggers on branch deleted
repository_tag_created: triggers on tag created
repository_tag_deleted: triggers on tag deleted
note_created: triggered on pull request's issue (note) creation
project_created: triggered on project creation
project_deleted: triggered on project deletion
group_created: triggered on group creation
group_deleted: triggered on group deletion
repository_created: triggered on repository creation
repository_deleted: triggered on repository deletion

GitRev.description:
GitRev is the git revision (ref, tag name, branch name, commit-ish etc)
https://git-scm.com/docs/gitrevisions

email.description: Email of the user (as in the Git config)

name.description: Name of the user (as in the Git config)

GroupCreated.description:
GroupCreated
is emitted on group creation

GroupDeleted.description:
GroupDeleted
is emitted on group deletion

status.description: Status is an indexing status

Issue.title: Issue
Issue.description: Represents a user issue assigned to a repo's branch.

complete_at.description: Job complete time (set if Status is complete).

stage.description: Current execution stage name (key defined by Job enum).

stage_number.description: Current execution stage number (out of Stages).

JobId.title: JobId
JobId.description: represent a background job unique id.

initial_stage_parameters.description:
Initial job stage parameters.
type: object

max_attempts.description:
Max job retries count.
type: integer

JobKey.title: JobKey
JobKey.description: represents a worker job unique per type key.

JobStatus.title: JobStatus
JobStatus.description:
Represents job execution status.
in_progress: job is running
error: job finished with an error
complete: job successfully finished

JobType.title: JobType
JobType.description: represents a worker job unique type.

Label.title: Label
Label.description: Direct analog of hashtags, the nature of the entity is configured by the object_type field.

summary.description: First line of the commit log message.

LineFragment.description: Represents line fragment model, which contains match offset and length data in bytes.

LinkedIssuesInput.description: Represents a pull request's linked issues input.

ListPullRequestActivityOptions.description: Represents pull request's activities additional filtering and pagination options.

MergeConflict.title: MergeConflict
MergeConflict.description: Represents repository pull request merge conflicts information of a single file.

MergePullRequestInput.title: MergePullRequestInput

style.description:
Merge style.
merge PullRequestMergeStyleMerge  Non fast-forward merge source into target.
rebase PullRequestMergeStyleRebase  Rebase a source onto a target and do fast-forward merge.
fast-forward-only PullRequestMergeStyleFastForward  Fast-forward only merge.
squash PullRequestMergeStyleSquash  Squash commits into single commit and do non fast-forward merge.
rebase-merge PullRequestMergeStyleRebaseMerge  Rebase a source into target and do non fast-forward merge.
manually-merged PullRequestMergeStyleManuallyMerged  Pull request has been merged manually, just mark it as merged directly.
style.x-go-enum-desc:
merge PullRequestMergeStyleMerge  Non fast-forward merge source into target.
rebase PullRequestMergeStyleRebase  Rebase a source onto a target and do fast-forward merge.
fast-forward-only PullRequestMergeStyleFastForward  Fast-forward only merge.
squash PullRequestMergeStyleSquash  Squash commits into single commit and do non fast-forward merge.
rebase-merge PullRequestMergeStyleRebaseMerge  Rebase a source into target and do non fast-forward merge.
manually-merged PullRequestMergeStyleManuallyMerged  Pull request has been merged manually, just mark it as merged directly.

MergePullRequestOptions.title: MergePullRequestOptions

merge_commit_message.description: This field required for all merge styles except fast-forward.

MergePullRequestOptions.description:
Represents repository pull request merge options.
Should be passed only if merge style one of the following: merge, squash, rebase-merge

Represents the last repository mirror sync status.
pending: is the initial sync status (applies for non-mirror repos as well)
synced: the last sync was successful
error: the last sync did fail (mirror_last_error keeps the error occurred)

Represents repository mirror type.
push: push mirror
pull: pull (fetch) mirror

optional PolicyCIBuildTypeOptional

project_area.description: ProjectArea folder path where project is located

repo_id.description: repo_id identifier of the repository this policy belongs to

PrSettings.title: PrSettings

allow_auto_merge.description: Indicates whether auto merge is allowed for the PR.

allow_merge_types_fast_forward.description: Indicates whether fast-forward is allowed as a merge type.

allow_merge_types_merge_commit.description: Indicates whether merge commit is allowed as a merge type.

allow_merge_types_squash.description: Indicated where squash is allowed as a merge type.

approvals_min.description: Minimum number of assignee approvals needed to merge a PR.

block_merging_for_unassigned_changed_fil.description: Indicates whether pull request merging should be blocked according to unassigned changed files.

block_merging_without_linked_issues.description: Indicates whether pull request merging should be blocked according to no linked issues.

code_quality_scan.description:
Defines the necessity of a successful code quality scan to merge a PR.
If False, code quality scan doesn't block the merge.

create_pr_hook_message.description: If set, the Git CLI displays a web link to create a new PR when a new branch is pushed.

default_assignees.description: List of default assignee principal names to set for each new PR created.

delete_source_branch_after_merge_by_defa.description: Indicates whether the source branch should be deleted after merge by default.

merge_branch_source_up_to_date.description:
Indicates whether pull request merging should be blocked according to merge branch source is not up to date.
If False, merge branch source that is not up to date doesn't block the merge.

rejects_max.description: Maximum number of assignee rejects that is acceptable to merge a PR.

PrSettings.description:
Represents a repository pull request settings.

# DEPRECATED

PrSourceBranchUpdate.title: PrSourceBranchUpdate
PrSourceBranchUpdate.description: is emitted on branch related to a PR as the source push.

PrStatusChange.title: PrStatusChange
PrStatusChange.description: is emitted on PR status change (or merge status change).

groups.description: SubProjects list of project groups or group subgroups

parent_id.description: ParentID is a group characteristic, which belongs it to a specified group or project identifier

ProjectCreated.description:
ProjectCreated
is emitted on project creation

ProjectDeleted.description:
ProjectDeleted
is emitted on project deletion

can_create_repository.description: CanCreateRepository defines access to create repositories.

can_edit_advanced.description: CanEditAdvanced defines access to delete project.

can_edit_advanced_quality_gate.description: CanEditAdvancedQualityGate defines access to delete quality gates and to edit plugins.

can_edit_advanced_quality_plugin.description: CanEditAdvancedQualityPlugin defines access to activate, deactivate or delete plugin.

can_edit_advanced_settings.description: CanEditAdvancedSettings defines access to edit project visibility setting.

can_edit_quality_gate.description: CanEditQualityGate defines access to edit quality gates.

can_edit_quality_plugin.description: CanEditQualityPlugin defines access to edit plugin general settings, activate/deactivate plugin rules, etc.

can_edit_roles.description: CanEditRoles defines access to assign roles, actions.

can_edit_settings.description: CanEditSettings defines access to edit settings.

can_edit_teams.description: CanEditTeams defines access to edit teams.

can_import_repository.description: CanImportRepository defines access to import repositories.

can_view_quality_gate.description: CanViewQualityGate defines access to view quality gates.

can_view_quality_plugin.description: CanViewQualityPlugin defines access to view plugins and plugin's rules.

can_view_roles.description: CanViewRoles defines access to view roles, actions.

can_view_settings.description: CanViewSettings defines access to view settings.

can_view_teams.description: CanViewTeams defines access to view teams.

enable_file_storage_policy_limit.description: Enable soft and hard file usage quotas limit setting.

enable_repo_storage_policy_limit.description: Enable soft and hard repository usage quotas limit setting.

file_storage_policy_hard_limit.description: Hard limit file usage quotas setting.

file_storage_policy_soft_limit.description: Soft limit file usage quotas setting.

repo_storage_policy_hard_limit.description: Hard limit repository usage quotas setting.

repo_storage_policy_soft_limit.description: Soft limit repository usage quotas setting.

closed_at.description: Pull request close time if closed

conflicts.description: List of pull request files - keep it for backward compatability

description.example: Let me introduce so marvelous changes.

merge_status.description:
Pull request merge status
conflict PullRequestMergeStatusConflict  Pull request has conflicted changes.
empty PullRequestMergeStatusEmpty  Pull request's resulting patch is empty.
ready PullRequestMergeStatusReady  Pull request is ready for merge.
checking PullRequestMergeStatusChecking  Pull request status checking is in progress.
error PullRequestMergeStatusError  Pull request is in an erroneous state.
merging PullRequestMergeStatusMerging  Pull request merge is in progress.
merged PullRequestMergeStatusMerged  Pull request has been merged via the API.
manually_merged PullRequestMergeStatusManuallyMerged  Pull request has been merged manually through the git CLI.
merge_status.x-go-enum-desc:
conflict PullRequestMergeStatusConflict  Pull request has conflicted changes.
empty PullRequestMergeStatusEmpty  Pull request's resulting patch is empty.
ready PullRequestMergeStatusReady  Pull request is ready for merge.
checking PullRequestMergeStatusChecking  Pull request status checking is in progress.
error PullRequestMergeStatusError  Pull request is in an erroneous state.
merging PullRequestMergeStatusMerging  Pull request merge is in progress.
merged PullRequestMergeStatusMerged  Pull request has been merged via the API.
manually_merged PullRequestMergeStatusManuallyMerged  Pull request has been merged manually through the git CLI.

merged_at.description: Pull request merge time if merged

source_branch.description: Branch name of the pull request source (source is merged to the target).

target_branch.description: Branch name of the pull request target (source is merged to the target).

PullRequestActivity.title: PullRequestActivity represents an activity record of the pull request with.

assignees.description: List of users targeted by the event in the assignment context (e.g. 'reviewers assigned'). Displayed for the 'reviewers' event group.

commits_added.description: List of commit hashes added during the event. Displayed for the 'commits' event group.

commits_added_count.description: Added commits count. Displayed for the 'commits' event group.

commits_deleted.description: List of commit hashes deleted during the event. Displayed for the 'commits' event group.

commits_deleted_count.description: Deleted commits count. Displayed for the 'commits' event group.

issue_id.description: Source code issue identifier. Displayed for the 'issues' event group.

PullRequestActivity.description: Every event type has its own set of the corresponding data to be presented.

PullRequestActivityCiBuild.title: PullRequestActivityCiBuild contains CI build data to display for build related events.

PullRequestActivityCommit.title: PullRequestActivityCommit contains commit data to display for commit related events.

commited_at.description: Time when the commit was done locally.

message.description: Commit message text. Truncated if the size exceeds hard coded limit.

PullRequestAuthors.title: PullRequestAuthors

users.description: Users have self user will always be in first place, if available.

PullRequestAuthors.description: Represents repository pull request authors information.

PullRequestAutoMerge.title: PullRequestAutoMerge

completed_at.description: CompletedAt represents the timestamp when the pull request auto merge was completed.

created_at.description: CreatedAt represents the timestamp when the pull request auto merge was created.

delete_source_branch.description: Delete source branch option for merged pull request

merge_style.description:
Pull request merge style
merge PullRequestMergeStyleMerge  Non fast-forward merge source into target.
rebase PullRequestMergeStyleRebase  Rebase a source onto a target and do fast-forward merge.
fast-forward-only PullRequestMergeStyleFastForward  Fast-forward only merge.
squash PullRequestMergeStyleSquash  Squash commits into single commit and do non fast-forward merge.
rebase-merge PullRequestMergeStyleRebaseMerge  Rebase a source into target and do non fast-forward merge.
manually-merged PullRequestMergeStyleManuallyMerged  Pull request has been merged manually, just mark it as merged directly.
merge_style.x-go-enum-desc:
merge PullRequestMergeStyleMerge  Non fast-forward merge source into target.
rebase PullRequestMergeStyleRebase  Rebase a source onto a target and do fast-forward merge.
fast-forward-only PullRequestMergeStyleFastForward  Fast-forward only merge.
squash PullRequestMergeStyleSquash  Squash commits into single commit and do non fast-forward merge.
rebase-merge PullRequestMergeStyleRebaseMerge  Rebase a source into target and do non fast-forward merge.
manually-merged PullRequestMergeStyleManuallyMerged  Pull request has been merged manually, just mark it as merged directly.

Represents repository pull request status filter.
open: newly created pull request
rejected: pull request changes have been discarded
merged: pull request has merged

PullRequestStatusFilter.title: PullRequestStatusFilter
PullRequestStatusFilter.description:
Represents repository pull request status filter.
open: filter opened pull requests (all except merged and rejected)
close: filter closed pull requests (merged and rejected)
merged: filter merged pull requests
rejected: filter rejected pull requests
all: filter all pull requests

SourceBranchDeleteStatus.title: SourceBranchDeleteStatus
SourceBranchDeleteStatus.description:
Represents repository pull request source branch deletion status
none: no deletion was triggered
success: successfully deleted
not_found: source branch was not found
no_permission: user has no permissions for branch deletion
forbid_default_branch: cannot delete default branch
forbid_protected_branch: cannot delete protected branch
forbid_open_pull_requests: cannot delete branch with open pull requests
internal_error: unknown internal error happened during branch deletion

allow_auto_merge.description: Indicates whether auto merge is allowed for the PR.

allow_merge_types_fast_forward.description: Indicates whether fast-forward is allowed as a merge type.

allow_merge_types_merge_commit.description: Indicates whether merge commit is allowed as a merge type.

allow_merge_types_squash.description: Indicated whether squash is allowed as a merge type.

approvals_min.description: Minimum number of assignee approvals needed to merge a PR.

block_merging_for_unassigned_changed_fil.description: Indicates whether pull request merging should be blocked according to unassigned changed files.

block_merging_without_linked_issues.description: Indicates whether pull request merging should be blocked according to no linked issues.

code_quality_scan.description:
Defines the necessity of a successful code quality scan to merge a PR.
If False, code quality scan doesn't block the merge.

create_pr_hook_message.description: If set, the Git CLI displays a web link to create a new PR when a new branch is pushed.

default_assignees.description: List of default assignee principal names to set for each new PR created.

delete_source_branch_after_merge_by_defa.description: Indicates whether the source branch should be deleted after merge by default.

merge_branch_source_up_to_date.description:
Defines the necessity of a successful code quality scan to merge a PR.
If False, code quality scan doesn't block the merge.

rejects_max.description: Maximum number of assignee rejects that is acceptable to merge a PR.

UpdatePrSettingsInput.description:
Represents a repository pull request settings update options.

# DEPRECATED

is_public.description: Is project public or private (default - false).

enable_file_storage_policy_limit.description: Enable soft file size usage quotas setting.

enable_repo_storage_policy_limit.description: Enable soft repository usage quotas limit setting.

file_storage_policy_hard_limit.description: Hard limit file usage quotas setting.

file_storage_policy_soft_limit.description: Soft limit file usage quotas setting.

repo_storage_policy_hard_limit.description: Hard limit repository usage quotas setting.

repo_storage_policy_soft_limit.description: Soft limit repository usage quotas setting.

UpdateProtectedBranchesSettingsInput.title: UpdateProtectedBranchesSettingsInput
UpdateProtectedBranchesSettingsInput.description: Represents repository protected branches settings update input.

UpdatePullRequestInput.title: UpdatePullRequestInput
UpdatePullRequestInput.description: Represents a repository pull request update options.

UpdateRepoPolicyInput.title: UpdateRepoPolicyInput

allow_auto_merge.description: Indicates whether auto merge is allowed for the PR.

approvals_min.description: Minimum number of assignee approvals needed to merge a PR.

default_assignees.description: List of default assignee principal names to set for each new PR created.

is_active.description: IsActive tag which indicates whether the setting is enabled

rejects_max.description: Maximum number of assignee rejects that is acceptable to merge a PR.

UpdateRepoPolicyInput.description: Represents a repository pull request settings update options.

UpdateServiceAccountInput.title: UpdateServiceAccountInput
UpdateServiceAccountInput.description: Represents the project service account update options.

UpdateUserPublicKeyInput.title: UpdateUserPublicKeyInput
UpdateUserPublicKeyInput.description: Represents the user public key update options.

UpdateUserTokenInput.title: UpdateUserTokenInput
UpdateUserTokenInput.description: Represents the user access token update options.

can_create_project.description: CanCreateProject defines access to create projects.

can_edit_advanced_quality_gate.description: CanEditAdvancedQualityGate defines access to delete quality gates and to edit plugins.

can_edit_advanced_quality_plugin.description: CanEditAdvancedQualityPlugin defines access to activate, deactivate or delete plugin.

can_edit_quality_gate.description: CanEditQualityGate defines access to edit quality gates.

can_edit_quality_plugin.description: CanEditQualityPlugin defines access to edit plugin general settings, activate/deactivate plugin rules, etc.

can_edit_roles.description: CanEditRoles defines access to assign roles, actions.

can_view_knowledge_base.description: CanViewKnowledgeBase defines access to view list of rules and rules itself.

can_view_quality_gate.description: CanViewQualityGate defines access to view quality gates.

can_view_quality_plugin.description: CanViewQualityPlugin defines access to view plugins and plugin's rules.

can_view_roles.description: CanViewRoles defines access to view roles, actions.

can_view_self_ssh_key.description: CanViewSelfSshKey defines access to view list of ssh keys itself.

can_view_self_token.description: CanViewSelfToken defines access to view list of tokens itself.

can_view_ssh_key.description: CanViewSshKey defines access to view list of ssh keys.

can_write_advanced_self_ssh_key.description: CanWriteAdvancedSelfSshKey defines advanced access to edit list of ssh keys itself.

can_write_advanced_self_token.description: CanWriteAdvancedSelfToken defines advanced access to edit list of tokens itself.

can_write_advanced_ssh_key.description: CanWriteAdvancedSshKey defines access to edit list of ssh keys.

can_write_self_ssh_key.description: CanWriteSelfSshKey defines access to edit list of ssh keys itself.

can_write_self_token.description: CanWriteSelfToken defines access to edit list of tokens itself.

UserPublicFingerprint.title: UserPublicFingerprint
UserPublicFingerprint.description: defines a user public key fingerprint (hash).

UserPublicKey.title: UserPublicKey
UserPublicKey.description: Represents the user public key used for interaction with a repository over SSH.

suffix.description: Last eight characters of the token.

UserTokenHash.title: UserTokenHash
UserTokenHash.description: defines a unique user access token hash (ID).

WebhookBranchAndTagFilter.title: WebhookBranchAndTagFilter
WebhookBranchAndTagFilter.description: Represents webhook branch and tag filter (glob).

WebhookEvent.title: WebhookEvent
WebhookEvent.description:
Represents webhook event.
pull_request_created: created event, which is guaranteed to trigger once upon pull request creation.
pull_request_open: triggers on some events of pull_request_status_change (pr_status=open, pr_merge_status=ready)
pull_request_commit: triggers on pull request commit
pull_request_merged: triggers on pull request merged
pull_request_closed: triggers on pull request closed
repository_push: triggers on push
repository_branch_created: triggers on branch created
repository_branch_deleted: triggers on branch deleted
repository_tag_created: triggers on tag created
repository_tag_deleted: triggers on tag deleted

WebhookInfo.title: WebhookInfo
WebhookInfo.description: A brief description of the webhooks created for display before deleting the service account.

project_id_or_url.description: Sfera CI/CD project ID or URL.

id.description: Unique identifier of the reviewer group

is_external.description: Whether this is an external review group

is_removable.description: Whether this group can be removed

is_required.description: Whether this group is required for approval

number_of_approvals.description: Number of required approvals from this group

pr_policy_id.description: ID policy of the pull request

specify_reviewers.description: Whether specific reviewers must be specified

errors.description: List of errors that occurred during the request.

Response status (HTTP response code as string).
Useful to distinguish between network 404 and API 404.

data.description: Data is a list of the usernames added/removed to/from pull request.
